thread.title: Joe Biden Decision: The vice president sidesteps the question
thread.title_full: Joe Biden Decision: The vice president sidesteps the question - POLITICO

author: Glenn Thrush
title: Joe Biden Decision: The vice president sidesteps the question
text:
Joe Biden still isn’t giving any indication on whether he’ll run for president and jokingly brushed off questions Thursday. The vice president was standing outside of his residence at the U.S. Naval Observatory to greet South Korean President Park Geun-Hye when he was asked if he would jump in the 2016 race, according to a White House pool report.
He offered a series of answers, none of which answered the question.
“I'll answer it in Korea...," he said. "I'm here to greet President Park. I'll talk to you all about that later."
"I can't hear you," he continued. "I'll tell you what, good to see you all. "
Biden had said he would make a decision by the end of last summer but has yet to announce his intentions.
